title: Chino Valley Ranchers Adds Egg Whites to their List of Products
excerpt: Local Family Egg Farm Continues to Produce Egg Products Consumers Want
author: Chino Valley Ranchers
content:
Local Family Egg Farm Continues to Produce Egg Products Consumers Want

Colton, CA – Chino Valley Ranchers, a family-owned and operated egg farm that prides itself on its happy, healthy, free-range hens, announced that they are now selling liquid egg whites at select grocery stores such as Mother’s Market and Sprouts Farmers Market.

Chino Valley Ranchers has added two variations of the liquid egg whites to their ever-growing list of products: 100% cage-free liquid egg whites and organic liquid egg whites.

Both of these quality products are fat free, cholesterol free, and an excellent source of protein. Egg whites are full of vitamins and minerals, such as riboflavin, which is an added health benefit for the consumer. There are no artificial ingredients or additives of any kind in Chino Valley Ranchers’ eggs whites.

Chino Valley Ranchers sells several other egg products such as organic, soy free organic, organic omega-3, organic pasture raised, humane harvest, veg-a-fed, veg-a-fed omega-3, and nutra-fresh fertile. All eggs are packaged in recycled cartons.

For more information on Chino Valley Ranchers’ liquid egg whites, contact 1-800-354-4503.

About Chino Valley Ranchers: Since 1953, Chino Valley Ranchers has been a family-owned and operated egg farm. They are devoted to producing the best-tasting and healthiest eggs on the planet. Their mission is to provide consumers with the freshest eggs at the best price and treat hens in the safest and most humane way possible.
